name: Island Ahead
description:
You are lost at sea and alone. You have nothing but your ship and your bare hands. Gather materials to improve your gear and ship. Oh, and save those baby turtles.

This game was a submission to the GGJ 2021 and will not receive further updates. 

A game made by Lukas Mayer, Karsten Oldsen, Yannick Pfeiffer and Markus Sprecher. Music and Sounds by Henning Bahnsen and Henning Lützen
